dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the CM/PowerHal/DDR voting issue as the root cause, aligning with the human expert report.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured the CM → DDR → VCORE chain but did not explicitly mention CPU involvement.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent accurately reported VCORE and DDR percentages but omitted specific CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly rules out MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No historical fixes or practical recommendations were provided.
